GameDBLocalizedString.Text: Reposición de A1At

Reposición intravenosa de la proteína Alfa-1 antitripsina. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorios / Unidades diagnósticas en el dpto. de Cirugía general, dpto. de Medicina Interna / dpto. UCI / Pabellones regulares / Unidades de Alta Dependencia
Cirugía abdominal
Surgery of abdominal area. \n\nHabitación requerida: Operating room at General Surgery dpt + ICU
Inhibidor de la ECA
Medicine for the treatment of hypertension. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
Analgésicos
Drugs, mostly in solid pill state to relieve from the pain. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
Antiácidos
Antacids are substances that neutralize stomach acidity, used to relieve heartburn, indigestion or an upset stomach. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
Crema antiinflamatoria
Non-steroidal anti-inflammatory cream used to treat various inflammations and also relieve from pain or swelling. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
Medicina antiepiléptica
Medicine used to treat various types and forms of seizures. \n\nHabitación requerida: Any diagnostic unit / ICU
Antiarrítmicos
Drugs usually given intravenously used to suppress abnormal rhytms of the heart. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
Pomada antibiótica
Special ointment fighting various bacteria. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room / Office/Diagnostic unit at Neurology dpt
Antibióticos
Special drugs, mainly in solid pill state used to fight various bacteria infections. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
Antidepresivos
Drugs used to treat of major depressive disorders dysthymia, anxiety, etc. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Office/Diagnostic unit at General Surgery dpt / Neurology dpt
Antidiarréicos

Medicine that slow or stops diarrhea, relieving the symptoms, but not eliminate the cause. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica en el General Surgery dpt / Internal Medicine dpt / ICU
Pomada anti hongos
Antifungal ointment with almost no side effects, providing long-term cure and reduced treatment time. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room
Antihemorrágicos
Medications or substances that stops bleeding. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
Antihistamínicos

Allergy treating drugs, opposing activity of histamine receptors in human body. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room / ICU / Office/Diagnostic unit at General Surgery dpt / Internal Medicine dpt / Neurology dpt
Medicamentos antihipertensivos

Drugs used to treat hypertension - high blood pressure. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room / ICU / Office/Diagnostic unit at General Surgery dpt / Cardiology dpt / Neurology dpt
Anticolinérgicos

Most commonly used medications for managing excessive sweating. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room / ICU / Office/Diagnostic unit at Internal Medicine dpt / Cardiology dpt / Neurology dpt
Antimicóticos

Antimycotics medication known as antifungals are used to treat various disease caused due to wide palette of fungal agents. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room / ICU / Office/Diagnostic unit at Internal Medicine dpt
Medicamentos antiparásitos

Antiparasitics fight towards wide palette of parasitic organisms affecting human body organ systems. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room / Office/Diagnostic unit at Internal Medicine dpt
Antipsicóticos
Medication used to deal with various psychic disorders. \n\nHabitación requerida: ICU / Office/Diagnostic unit at Internal Medicine dpt / Neurology dpt
Antipiréticos
Drugs, in solid pill state that are used to relieve from fever, hyperpyrexy; reducing the body temperature. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
Antisépticos

Medicine substances generally in liquid or aerosol form with antimicrobial effect, reducing the possibility of infection. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room / Trauma center / ICU / Office/Diagnostic unit at General Surgery dpt / Internal Medicine dpt / Orthopeady and Trauma dpt
Antihelmíntico
Pills that are used to fight against tapeworm infections. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room
Antitiroideos
Also called thionamides are used to treat hyperthyroidism by blocking formation of thyroid hormone. \n\nHabitación requerida: ICU / Office/Diagnostic unit at General Surgery dpt
Supresores de la tos
Drugs in liquid or solid pill state used to suppress the chronic types of cough. Not eliminating the cause. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
Antivirales

Medication that inhibit the development of targeted viruses, unlike the antibiotics, antiviral drugs do not destroy the pathogen. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room / ICU / Office/Diagnostic unit ar General Surgery dpt / Neurology dpt
Ansiolíticos
Medication that inhibits anxiety. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
Yeso para el brazo
Protective shell from plaster and bandage to protect fractured limb or joint. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room / Trauma center / Office/Diagnostic unit at Orthopaedy dpt
Órtesis para el brazo
Orthosis control, guide, immobilize certain joint, limb. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room / Trauma center / Operating room / Office/Diagnostic unit at Orthopaedy dpt
Respiración artificial

Procedure to quickly restore respiration - exchange of the gases by the respiratory system. It consist of endotracheal intubation of patient and connecting him to mechanical ventilation. \n\nHabitación requerida: Observation room / Trauma center / Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
Ligadura con banda
Endoscopic treatment to ensure that varices in oesophagus will not bleed. \n\nHabitación requerida: Operating room
Vendaje
Broad spectrum using consumable. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room / Office/Diagnostic unit at Orthopaedy dpt
Suplemento de complejo B
Supplement of B vitamins. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room / Office/Diagnostic unit at Internal Medicine dpt
Beta bloqueador
Medications that are used to manage abnormal heart rhythm, but can treat high blood pressure, heart failure, tremor. \n\nHabitación requerida: Any office / diagnostic uni
Transfusión de sangre
Procedure of receiving portions of blood due to serious blood loss, diseases or systemic damage to blood cells. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica / Ward / Unit
Pastilla para el fortalecimiento óseo

Supportive drugs used to improve the strength of the bones. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room / Office/Diagnostic unit at General Surgery dpt / Internal Medicine dpt / Orthopaedy dpt.
Aparato ortopédico de Boston
It is a type of back orthosis. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica en el Orthopaedy dpt
Broncodilatadores
Medication that dilates bronchi and bronchioles, decreasing the airways resistance, increasing the airflow to the lungs. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica / ICU
Cirugía cardiaca
Cardiovascular surgery is often used for treatment of various heart disease. \n\nHabitación requerida: Operating room at Cardiology dpt
Reducción cerrada
Procedure consisting of gentle maneuvers to help bones and joints to get back to proper position. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica en el Orthopaedy dpt.
Anticoagulantes
Drugs preventing blood platelets to stick to each other anf forming clots. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica en el Cardiology dpt
Hielo local
Cold compression wraps are used to calm down painful area of body. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Trauma center / Observation room / Office/Diagnostic unit at Orthopaedy dpt.
Compresiones
Elastic bandages. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room / Trauma center / Office/Diagnostic unit at General Surgery dpt / Orthopaedy dpt
Inyecciones de corticoides
Synthetic streoid hormones drugs with a broad spectrum of use from tumors to skin diseases. \n\nHabitación requerida: ICU / Office/Diagnostic unit at Orthopaedy dpt
Corticoides
Synthetic streoid hormones drugs with a broad spectrum of use from tumors to skin diseases. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
Craneotomía
Neurological surgery to acces the brain. \n\nHabitación requerida: Operating room
Desfibrilación

Procedure to deliver dose of electric current to the heart to re-establish normal hearth rhytm. 

Habitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica 

Equipo requerido: Defibrillator
Desmopresina

Intravenous application of hormone that stimulates factors responsible for blood clotting process. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room / ICU / Office/Diagnostic unit at Internal Medicine dpt
Diálisis

It is process of removing excesses of cell metabolism from the bloodstream, if kidneys normal function is damaged and they are not capable of maintain this ability. Diagnostic unit at General Surgery dpt \n\nEquipo requerido: Dialysis machine
Cambios en la dieta
Advices or prescription about daily diet, change of consummated food, beverages, etc. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
Diuréticos
Medications that lower the amount of sodium and water in the body. \n\nHabitación requerida: ICU / Office/Diagnostic unit at General Surgery dpt / Internal Medicine dpt / Cardiology dpt
Recomendaciones
Doctor gives best recommendation to support treatment. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
Gotas para los oídos

Medicine in liquid drops state that treats specific symptoms in human ear. Could contain various healing substances including antibiotics. Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica en el General Surgery dpt / Internal Medicine dpt / Neurology dpt
Codera
Protective padded gear. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica en el Orthopaedy dpt
Cuidado de emergencias
Procedure to take care of the wound, laceration, injury, trauma, stop any bleeding and cover by sterile sheet material. Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica / ICU
Cauterización endoscópica

Endoscopic cauterizing is surgical procedure through the upper part of digestive tract. Cateurizing is a specialized medical practice of burning tissue to remove or close off a part of it. It is widely used to stop internal bleedings not only during surgeries. \n\nHabitación requerida: Operating room at General Surgery dpt
Cirugía endoscópica
Refers to minimal invasive surgery with endoscopic set of instruments. \n\nHabitación requerida: Operating room at Orthopaedy dpt
Dosis de etanol
Ethanol is very effective in methanol poisonings. \n\nHabitación requerida: Any ward / ICU / doctor's office / Trauma center / Observation room / Office/Diagnostic unit at Internal Medicine dpt
Ejercicio
Low-impact aerobic exercise, strengthening exercises or any support exercises. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
Gotas para los ojos

Medicine in liquid drops state that treats specific symptoms in human eye. Either contain a antibacterial agent, anti-histamines or drugs to decrease the blood pressure inside the eye.\n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room / Office/Diagnostic unit at General Surgery dpt / Internal Medicine dpt / Neurology dpt
Cirugía de ojos
Delicate surgery to patient's eye.
Crema para los pies
Lotion foot cream for broad spectrum of use. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room / Office/Diagnostic unit at Orthopaedy dpt
Cirugía de fractura - Brazo
Surgery on arm to completely fix the specific fracture. \n\nHabitación requerida: Operating room at Orthopaedy dpt
Cirugía de fractura - Cabeza
Surgery on head to completely fix the specific fracture \n\nHabitación requerida: Operating room at Orthopaedy dpt
Cirugía de fractura - Pierna
Surgery on leg to completely fix the specific fracture. \n\nHabitación requerida: Operating room at Orthopaedy dpt
Cirugía de reemplazo de cadera
Surgery that replaces damaged hip joint. \n\nHabitación requerida: Operating room at Orthopaedy dpt
Tratamiento en casa
Patient will treat himself at home. No hospitalization is required. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
Hospitalización en la UAD
Hospitalize patient at High dependency unit. \n\nHabitación requerida: High dependency unit
Hospitalización en la UCI
Hospitalize patient at ICU department. \n\nHabitación requerida: ICU
Hospitalización regular
Hospitalize patient at Regular ward. \n\nHabitación requerida: Regular ward
Observación
Admit the patient for observation when expecting dangerous symptoms. \n\nHabitación requerida: Observation room
Hospitalización en Centro de Trauma
Trauma center accepts critical cases when they get delivered to the hospital. \n\nHabitación requerida: Trauma center
Terapia de quelación
Medical procedure to remove heavy metals from the body. \n\nHabitación requerida: ICU / any ward / doctor's office / Observation room / Trauma center / Office/Diagnostic unit at Internal Medicine dpt
Suplemento de vitamina D
Supplementation of vitamin D3. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica en el Orthopaedy dpt.
Incisión y drenaje
Incision and drainage procedure to cut off abscesses. \n\nHabitación requerida: Any Diagnostic unit / ICU / Observation room / doctor's office
Coma inducido
Medical procedure of drug-controlled induced temporary coma before the brain surgery to protect brain and ease healing process. \n\nHabitación requerida: Operating room
Terapia de insulina
Medication that lowers high sugar levels in blood. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica en el Internal Medicine dpt.
Interferón alfa-2b
It is highly specific antivirotic that is used worldwide to treat chronic presentations of Hepatitis B and C. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica en el General Surgery dpt
Antibióticos intravenosos

It is treatment form during patient's hospital observation when the antibiotics are taken directly to veins and bloodstream to improve effectiveness and enhance the effect. \n\nHabitación requerida: Any office / ward / unit
Atropina intravenosa

It is treatment form during patient's hospital observation when the atropine is taken directly to veins and bloodstream to improve effectiveness and enhance the effect. \n\nHabitación requerida: Any office / ward / unit
Gluconato de calcio intravenoso
Intravenous supplement of calcium. \n\nHabitación requerida: Any office / ward / unit
Corticoides intravenosos
Intravenous corticosteroid medication. \n\nHabitación requerida: Any office / ward / unit
Inmunoglobina intravenosa
Intravenous purified blood product containing antibodies that block patient's damaging antibodies. \n\nHabitación requerida: Any office / ward / unit
Infusión intravenosa
Procedure to deliver liquid substances directly to blood stream. \n\nHabitación requerida: Any office / ward / unit
Nutrición intravenosa

Also called Parenteral nutrition is process of feeding patient intravenously, bypassing the usual oral way. Solution contains various important nutrients for proper functioning of the body preventing the malnutrition. \n\nHabitación requerida: Any office / ward / unit
Suplemento de hierro
Supplement pills of iron. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room
Cirugía de articulación - Brazo
Surgery on arm to completely fix the specific joint, to reconstruct its ligaments. \n\nHabitación requerida: Operating room at Orthopaedy dpt
Cirugía de articulación - Pierna
Surgery on leg to completely fix the specific joint, to reconstruct its ligaments. \n\nHabitación requerida: Operating room at Orthopaedy dpt
Cirugía laparoscópica

Also called as minimally invasive surgery is modern surgical technique in which are operations performed through small incisions with use of a laparoscope. \n\nHabitación requerida: Operating room at General Surgery dpt

Also called as minimally invasive surgery is modern surgical technique in which are operations performed through small incisions with use of a laparoscope. \n\nHabitación requerida: Operating room at General Surgery dpt
Yeso para la pierna
Protective shell from plaster and bandage to protect fractured limb or joint. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room / Trauma center / Office/Diagnostic unit at Orthopaedy dpt
Órtesis para la pierna
Orthosis control, guide, immobilize certain joint, limb. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room / Trauma center / Office/Diagnostic unit/Operating room at Orthopaedy dpt
Soporte vital
Life support procedure to maintain vital functions during coma. \n\nHabitación requerida: ICU / Trauma center
Medicamentos para el hígado
Beneficial drugs for various liver diseases used for improving health condition of liver. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica en el General Surgery dpt
Expectorantes

Drugs in liquid state that helping to dissolve and clear the mucus form the airways. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room / ICU / Office/Diagnostic unit at Internal Medicine dpt
Gotas nasales

Medicine which aid to clear the nasal route, relieving form nasal congestion. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room / Office/Diagnostic unit at Internal Medicine dpt / Cardiology dpt
Nitratos
Nitrates relax and widen blood vessels. \n\nHabitación requerida: Regular ward / High dependency unit / ICU / Office/Diagnostic unit at Cardiology dpt
AINEs
Los medicamentos antiinflamatorios no esteroideos se utilizan para tratar varias inflamaciones y también para calmar el dolor. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
Pomada anestésica
Ointment medicine calming down the affected area. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
Cirugía de osteomielitis
Surgery of the bone to drain infected area, remove diseased bone and tissue, restore blood flow to the bone. \n\nHabitación requerida: Operating room at Orthopaedy dpt
Oxigenoterapia
Supplementation of oxygen through airways. \n\nHabitación requerida: Doctor's office / Observation room / ICU / High dependency unit
Pericardiocentésis
Procedure to evacuate excessive fluid from pericardium to make heart work properly. \n\nHabitación requerida: Operating room at Cardiology dpt
TREP

La terapia de reemplazo de enzimas pancreáticas contiene Pancreatina - una mezcla de enzimas pancreáticas, lipasa, amilasa y proteasa. Éstas ayudan a la digestión de las grasas, carbohidratos y proteínas. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica en el dpto. de Cirugía General
Plasmaféresis

Plasma exchange procedure. 

Habitación requerida: Diagnostic unit at Internal Medicine dpt / Neurology dpt. 

Equipo requerido: Dialysis machine
Transfusión de plaquetas
Special type of blood transfusion involving only platelets. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
Vendaje a presión
Bandage used to aid to stop massive hemorrhage. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
Terapia proliferativa
Injection-based treatment for chronic musculo-skeletal conditions. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room
Inhibidores de la bomba de protones

Drugs usually used for decrease gastric acid production of the stomach. Their main advantage is pronounced main action and long lasting duration. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica en el General Surgery dpt
Cirugía pulmonar
Pulmonary or Lung surgery is surgery done to repair o remove parts of lung tissue. \n\nHabitación requerida: Operating room at Internal Medicine dpt
Purgantes

Also called laxatives are mainly used to treat constipation and increase bowel movements. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room / Office/Diagnostic unit at General Surgery dpt / Internal Medicine dpt/ Neurology dpt
Inmunoglobina antirrábica
A fast acting shot to prevent rabies virus form infecting patient. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica en el Neurology dpt
EEM

La electroestimulación muscular es un tratamiento efectivo en varias lesiones o enfermedades que afectan el sistema musculoesquelético. 

Habitación requerida: Unidad diagnóstica en el dpto. de Ortopedia. 

Equipo requerido: EMG
Rehidratación
Prescription to get more fluids into the human body to prevent the loss of water. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
Cirugía vascular renal
Surgery to renal circulatory apparatus used to treat and repair veins and arteries. \n\nHabitación requerida: Operating room at Cardiology dpt
Reimplantación
Surgical re-attachment of a body part. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room / Trauma center / Office/Diagnostic unit at Orthopaedy dpt
Descanso
Prescription to avoid higher physical exertion to aid the human body save the energy needed for the treatment process. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
RICE
Reposo, Hielo, Compresión y Elevación (RICE por sus siglas en inglés) del miembro afectado. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
Aerosol nasal salino
Rinse nasal passages. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room
Litotricia por ondas de choque

It is one of the most common treatments for kidney, bladder and uteral stones. It is nonsurgical treatment using high energy ultrasound shock waves to broke the stones into dust. 

Habitación requerida: Sonography unit at General Surgery dpt 

Equipo requerido: Therapy shockwave
Medicinas para el sueño
Drugs in solid pill state that are used to help the sleeping problems. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
Espasmolíticos
Drugs in liquid or solid pill state that relieve from various types of spasms. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
Estapedectomía
Surgery that puts device into the middle ear that moves stuck stape bones. \n\nHabitación requerida: Operating room at Internal Medicine dpt
Crema con esteroides
Topical steroids are creams, ointments and lotions which contain steroid medicines. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
Stomachics
Drugs that strengthens or stimulates the stomach with broad spectrum of use. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
Hormonas tiroideas sintéticas

Medications used to treat hypothyroidism. They are synthetic, thus they are not derived from animal's thyroid glands and have fewer side effects. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica en el General Surgery dpt
Trombolíticos

Special medications that solves and destroy formed clots in blood stream, which reducing passage of the blood to the organs. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica en el Cardiology dpt
ATP intravenoso
El Activador Tisular del Plasminógeno ayuda a la recuperación luego de un derrame cerebral. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad Diagnóstica en el dpto. de Cardiología
Tranquilizadores
Medicine designed for the treatment of anxiety, fear, tension, agitation, and disturbances of the mind. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
Tratamiento con triple terapia

Special medicine that is indicated for the patients suffering from H. pylori infection or duodenal ulcers and consist of three different antibiotics. \n\nHabitación requerida: ICU / Regular ward / High dependency unit/ Office/Diagnostic unit at General Surgery dpt
Vasodilatadores
Medication that relaxes blood vessels. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room
Suplementos vitamínicos
Supplementation of various vitamins and minerals are taken to restore stability of organism. \n\nHabitación requerida: Consultorio / Unidad diagnóstica
Derivación ventriculoperitoneal
Ventriculoperitoneal Shunting is surgical procedure used to treat increased intracranial pressure. \n\nHabitación requerida: Operating room at Neurology dpt
Cierre de la herida
Procedure to sew muscles and skin. \n\nHabitación requerida: doctor's office / Observation room / Trauma center / Office/Diagnostic unit at Orthopaedy dpt
